sections.heading: ACTION OF NULLITYArt. 2001. Grounds in generalThe nullity of a final judgment may be demanded for vices of either form or substance, as provided in Articles 2002 through 2006
sections.text: ACTION OF NULLITYArt. 2001. Grounds in generalThe nullity of a final judgment may be demanded for vices of either form or substance, as provided in Articles 2002 through 2006.
